mapper.select: select NVL(count(*),0) from board_reply_report where br_num = #{br_num}
select * from board_reply_report where br_num=#{br_num} and m_num=#{m_num}

select * from (select aa.br_num,m.id,br.br_content,aa.brrcnt,b.b_num,b.category_num,m1.id bj_id,m2.id writer_id,b.b_title,c.category_name,rownum rnum from (select br_num,count(m_num) brrcnt from board_reply_report group by br_num order by brrcnt desc)aa,board_reply br,member m,member m1,member m2,board b,category c where aa.br_num=br.br_num and br_delete=0 and m.m_num=br.m_num and b.b_num=br.b_num and b.m_num=m2.m_num and m1.m_num=b.bj_num and b.category_num=c.category_num) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select NVL(count(a.br_num),0) from (select br_num,count(m_num) brrcnt from board_reply_report group by br_num)a,board_reply br where a.br_num=br.br_num and br.br_delete=0
select b.*,m.id from board_reply_report b,member m where br_num=#{br_num} and b.m_num=m.m_num
